scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a halo, rides a donkey carrying the Christ Child. She is dressed in a blue mantle. To her right stands a man in a blue hooded robe and a black hat, holding a rope attached to the donkey. Behind them, a large, multi-turreted building with pointed roofs and tall, narrow windows dominates the left side of the scene. In the background, rolling green hills are visible under a pale blue sky. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
